#!/static/bin/ash
PATH=/static/bin:/static/sbin:/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin export PATH
width=$1 height=$2
# Default logo is 470x90 pixels, pgbar 24px under logo and 10px high # pgbar 90% of screen width, everything centered
pgbar_offset_x=` expr ${width} / 20 ` img_offset_x=` expr ${width} / 2 - 209 ` pgbar_offset_y=` expr ${height} / 2 - 12 ` img_offset_y=` expr ${height} / 2 - 245 ` pgbar_width=` expr ${width} - 2 '*' ${pgbar_offset_x} `
# Show an icon beneath the bar icon_offset_x=` expr ${width} / 2 - 32 ` icon_offset_y=` expr ${pgbar_offset_y} + 34 `
# In some scripts you want to show a text message which is larger # than the icons, see for example the USB conversion script # text_offset_x=` expr ${width} / 2 - 200 ` text_offset_x=$pgbar_offset_x # text_offset_y=` expr ${pgbar_offset_y} + 20 ` text_offset_y=` expr ${height} - 150 `
# Config file for main logo
cat << EOF > /etc/lesslinux/fbsplash.cfg # Generated by /etc/rc.subr/write_fbsplash_config BAR_LEFT=${pgbar_offset_x} BAR_TOP=${pgbar_offset_y} BAR_WIDTH=${pgbar_width} BAR_HEIGHT=12 BAR_R=245 BAR_G=186 BAR_B=75 # Image position IMG_LEFT=${img_offset_x} IMG_TOP=${img_offset_y} # Blue background BG_R=0 BG_G=48 BG_B=104 NOFILL=0 EOF
# Config file for icons below progress bar cat << EOF > /etc/lesslinux/fbsplash_icon.cfg # Generated by /etc/rc.subr/write_fbsplash_config # Image position IMG_LEFT=${icon_offset_x} IMG_TOP=${icon_offset_y} # Do not repaint the BG NOFILL=1 EOF
# Config file for text below progress bar cat << EOF > /etc/lesslinux/fbsplash_text.cfg # Generated by /etc/rc.subr/write_fbsplash_config # Image position IMG_LEFT=${text_offset_x} IMG_TOP=${text_offset_y} # Do not repaint the BG NOFILL=1 EOF
#

#!/bin/bash
#lesslinux provides gtk3theme #lesslinux license BSD
PATH=/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/static/bin:/static/sbin export PATH
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams . /etc/rc.subr/colors
case $1 in start) printf "$bold===> Copy Adwaita theme for root $normal\n" mkdir -p /root/.config tar -C /usr/share/themes/Adwaita -cvf - gtk-3.0 gtk-2.0 | tar -C /root/.config -xf - ;; esac

#!/static/bin/ash
PATH=/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/static/bin:/static/sbin:/opt/bin:/opt/sbin
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams . /etc/rc.subr/colors . /etc/lesslinux/branding/branding.en.sh
export QT_QPA_PLATFORMTHEME=qt5ct
for i in /etc/xinitrc.d/[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-*.?? ; do provides="` cat $i | grep '#lesslinux provides' | awk '{print $3}' `" if echo "$skipservices" | grep -q '|'$provides'|' ; then echo "Skipping $provides" else $i start fi done
# Set DPI value if [ -f /home/surfer/.lesslinux/xstuff.xrdb ] ; then xrdb -merge /home/surfer/.lesslinux/xstuff.xrdb else mkdir -p /home/surfer/.lesslinux echo "Xft.dpi: ${dpi}" >> /home/surfer/.lesslinux/xstuff.xrdb xrdb -merge /home/surfer/.lesslinux/xstuff.xrdb fi
# sed -i 's/29\.0\.1/31.0/g' /home/surfer/Desktop/010_firefox.desktop rm -f "${HOME}/Desktop/005_wicd.desktop" install -m 0755 /usr/share/applications/connman-gtk.desktop "${HOME}/Desktop/" install -m 0755 /usr/share/applications/010_firefox.desktop "${HOME}/Desktop/" install -m 0755 /usr/share/applications/020_thunderbird.desktop "${HOME}/Desktop/" install -m 0755 /usr/share/applications/torbrowser.desktop "${HOME}/Desktop/" sed -i 's%005_wicd%connman-gtk%g' ${HOME}/.config/lxqt/panel.conf
# Uncomment to debug # /usr/bin/Terminal & # /usr/bin/xterm & # setxkbmap -rules xorg -model pc105 -layout "$xkbmap" # [ -f "${HOME}/Desktop/tarnmailer.desktop" ] || install -m 0755 /usr/share/applications/tarnmailer.desktop "${HOME}/Desktop"
if [ -f "${HOME}/.mozilla/plugins/libflashplayer.so" ] ; then echo "Found Flash" else install -m 0755 /usr/share/applications/flashinstall.desktop "${HOME}/Desktop/flashinstall.desktop" fi
setxkbmap -layout "$xkbmap" esetroot -scale /etc/lesslinux/branding/desktop.jpg Thunar --daemon & xfsettingsd sleep 1 xfsettingsd --replace if xdpyinfo | grep -q -i composite ; then sed -i 's/fake transparency=true/fake transparency=false/g' $HOME/.config/cairo-dock/current_theme/cairo-dock.conf compton --shadow-exclude '_GTK_FRAME_EXTENTS@:c' --fade-exclude '_GTK_FRAME_EXTENTS@:c' -cCGbf # xcompmgr -c & fi xbindkeys & xfdesktop & # icewm-session openbox & lxqt-panel shutdown-wrapper.sh
